messages.subject: Re: it's a girl!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Congratulations to you both, and Mook
messages.messageBody:
Congratulations to you both, and Mook< from the
Thorn Family of Perth, Western Australia - now
Mook will have responsibilities, eh.
so you'll be returning to America when?
Gregg

- http://onomy.gq.nu -
Pls send a cc to gollum@... as infrequent
problems plague the 'curtin' address.

messages.subject: Re: it's a girl!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/1999 11:28:28 PM !!!First Boot!!!, sfamily@sta.att.ne.jp writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/1999 11:28:28 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
sfamily@... writes:

<< Shiho Rachel Shimokawa was born Friday, November 12, 1999 at 4:16am.
She weighed 4200 grams (anybody want to figure that out in pounds and
ounces?) and was 51.3cm long.
>>
The newest member weighs in at around 9 pounds 4 ounces, and 20.19 inches
long!
CONGRATULATIONS TO YOU AND YOSHI!

Blessings,
Stephanie
Teacher and Mommy of 4 homeschooling fanatics, wife to the best principal,
protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.
I think that I will move closer to the gym, that way between sets,
I can run home and eat something sweet to keep up my energy! s.
Believe in others, and be a part; believe in yourself, and be the lead. s.
***Life's Learnings Academy - Protecting Our Children***
IT'S GREAT TO LEARN WHERE THE PRINCIPAL LOVES YOU
ICQ: 43428000 AOL IM: Lifeslearn

messages.subject: it's a girl!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Shiho Rachel Shimokawa was born Friday, November 12, 1999 at 4:16am. She weighed 4200 grams (anybody want to figure that out in pounds and ounces?) and was
messages.messageBody:
Shiho Rachel Shimokawa was born Friday, November 12, 1999 at 4:16am.
She weighed 4200 grams (anybody want to figure that out in pounds and
ounces?) and was 51.3cm long.

Love, Melanie
